To

This will call the function that.setup_argument with the correct template parameters and arg as parameter. The correct template parameter is based on the template argument passed to kernel_launcher_impl (see example for a more insightful understanding :-)). be more precise: If T is kernel_launcher_impl<void (*) (int, double)> and pos = 2 than the function that.setup_arument<double>(arg) is called.
Parameters:
T is expected to be of type kernel_launcher_impl< whatever >
